item.title: 【UPSCALED】LE SSERAFIM - EASY |HDR/SDR 60P[AI] FLAC
item.description:
AI enhanced to 60fps and Upsacle, I personally make HDR.
For devices that don't support HDR, I also exported SDR
A lot of problems have been improved and the picture is more natural.(Compared to previous AI)​


Flac from:ricardorihyun big thanks(Also thanks to other members who shared flac)
